English:
---------
Year: 2011
Genre: Simulator (Flight Combat) / 3D
Platform: PC
Developer: Gaijin Entertainment
Published by: Gaijin Entertainment

Publication Type: license
License: Freeware
Language: Russian (RUS), English (ENG), German (DE), Spanish (SPA), French (FRE), Italian (ITA), Polish (POL), Japanese (JAP), Czech (CZ)
Size: 11.13 GB

All information is: 

Description:
Version of the game - 1.0.4.7
Birds of Prey: The Collector's Edition includes:

Birds of Prey
Description:
"Birds of Prey" - a new military and historical aircraft simulator, which is based on real large-scale operations during the Second World War. The player will take the helm of a fighter, bomber or attack aircraft. Become a member of the most famous battles in the skies over Europe, including the battle for Berlin, Britain and Sicily, as well as Stalingrad and Korsun-Shevchenko battle!

"Birds of Prey" show incredible graphics and a stunning level of realism. The behavior of aircraft reproduced as accurately as possible, and detailed damage system will display the most epic battle in the sky, what you can imagine. Are you ready for an uncompromising air battles? Then fasten your seat belts and stronger pull on his helmet, because you feel one of the most realistic simulator aircraft ever available for PC!

Features:

The battles take part in hundreds of air and ground equipment. You will see from the cockpit of his plane full scale World War II, where the burgeoning explosion front line will unfold before you as the palm.
Take part in more than 50 missions in the skies over Western and Eastern Europe.
Go behind the controls of a variety of combat aircraft, including Soviet Elah, and La Yaqui, British Spitfire, American Mustang and Thunderbolt, German Messerschmitt, Focke-Wulf, Junkers, and others.
From a simplified regime for beginners to serious simulation.
Detailed system damage and the most realistic flight model.
Four collective mode with up to 32 people.
Support all kinds of game controllers, including a 6-DOF TrackIR, TripleHead2GO, as well as headsets for voice chat in multiplayer mode.
Support for add-ons downloaded through the service yuPlay: new aircraft and missions.
Inimitable music from a master of notes Jeremy Soule, who worked on projects such as The Elder Scrolls, Unreal II and Baldur's Gate.

Birds of Prey: Wings of Luftwaffe
Description:
Supplement contains ten single missions with support of the cooperative game modes for up to four players, two new aircraft and more than 40 new colorings for aircraft.

In Wings of Luftwaffe you will end up as a German pilot, becoming a party to the hottest battles in the skies over Britain, Sicily, the USSR, Belgium and Germany. Try to imagine all the passions in a variety of missions, from battles with squadrons of enemy fighters, to the bombing of ground targets in Stalingrad!

Are you ready to take the place of the best Luftwaffe aces? Then slide the lantern and get ready for take off, because the game will throw in the thick of World War II!

Features:

Try on the role of a German pilot.
Take the test in 10 intense missions.
Take part in the co-op game mode for up to 4 players.
If there had been at the helm of two new aircraft: Ju 88 A4 and P-39N-0.
Over 40 new colorings for aircraft.

Minimum system requirements:
Processor: Intel Pentium 4 3200 MHz (or equivalent)
Memory: 1024 MB
Graphics Card: NVIDIA GeForce 7600 256 MB
Hard drive (HDD): 10GB of free disk space for installation of the game.
Operating System: Microsoft Windows XP SP3, library DirectX 9.0c.
Sound Card compatible with DirectX (AC `97 or similar);

Recommended system requirements:
Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo 2400 MHz (or equivalent)
Memory: 2048 MB
Graphics Card: NVIDIA GeForce GTS 250 512 MB
Hard drive (HDD): 10GB of free disk space for installation of the game.
Operating System: Microsoft Windows XP SP3 c library DirectX 9.0c / Microsoft Windows Vista SP1 / Microsoft Windows 7
Sound Card compatible with DirectX (AC `97 or similar) with support for 5.1 channel sound.
